query.statement:
SELECT A.POSID ,A.CHK_KIND ,(CASE WHEN A.REQ_DATE = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE A.REQ_DATE END) AS ASK_DATE ,(CASE WHEN A.CHK_KIND = 'A' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0024 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.PSPID = A.PSPID AND X.POSID = A.POSID) >= 1 THEN 'X' WHEN A.CHK_KIND = 'C' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0037 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.PSPID = A.PSPID AND X.POSID = A.POSID AND X.CHASU = A.CHASU) > 1 THEN 'X' ELSE '' END) AS CHK1
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0036 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID AND A.POSID = B.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0023 AS H ON B.MANDT = H.MANDT AND B.POSID = H.PSPID AND B.POSID_1 = H.POSID AND H.ZTYPE = '2'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
#GUBUN+#
-- -- AND A.PSPID = #PSPID# -- -- AND A.REQ_GBN = #GBN1# -- AND A.CDATE BETWEEN #REDAT_FROM# AND #REDAT_TO# -- -- -- AND A.CHK_KIND = #GBN2# -- -- -- -- -- AND H.STATE = #GBN3# -- -- -- AND H.STATE IN ('1','2','4','8','9') -- -- -- -- -- AND A.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS# -- -- --team¡¶∞≈ -- -- -- -- -- -- AND B.ZTEAM = '' -- -- -- -- -- -- AND B.ZTEAM = 'X' -- -- -- -- -- -- -- AND A.CFM_DATE BETWEEN #CFMDAT_FROM# AND #CFMDAT_TO# -- -- -- -- AND A.FRO_DATE BETWEEN #FRDAT_FROM# AND #FRDAT_TO# -- -- -- --
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
